/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, stretches out into the distance, creating a sense of depth and scale. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, adding a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
